DOC.brief_title: Adalimumab Adult Japanese Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Participation completion Week 24 prior adalimumab doseranging study . Females must postmenopausal least 1 year , surgically sterile , practice birth control throughout study 90 day study completion . Female subject test negative pregnancy test ( serum test ) Week 24 prior adalimumab study , capable pregnancy . A subject experience follow prior study : Advanced poorly control diabetes Joint surgery ( joint evaluate study ) A subject prescribed exclude medication prior study . History follow prior study : Clinically significant drug alcohol abuse Intravenous ( iv ) drug abuse Active infection listeria tuberculosis ( TB ) Lymphoma , leukemia And , malignancy exception successfully treat nonmetastatic basal cell carcinoma skin .
